TopicTitle: So i make music stuff now, and i thought you might want to see

Articles.Content:
so in the long time i have been absent from this place, i got some musical education, and now i know what a c major chord is. also i've been making music things in my spare time. thought y'all might enjoy my best work yet, a full band stand tune for Coconut Mall

i have a ton more besides this one that i might upload too, i've got the soviet national anthem, scatmans world, Sweden, so many pieces. i'll upload them all eventually

wow i'm not consistent at all, almost 2 months ago since i last put anything here.

I've uploaded my first one i made. i didn't know how to transpose when i started so i made all the instruments have the same key, and it did not end up going well, but somehow i managed to fix it, and it sounds okay.

also there's cymbals in it but i gave up after the first 12 seconds cause i don't know how to make any percussion music
